posts.author: KidMiracleman
posts.content:
I really like the Gutsy Monk - Monk 20 / Dwarven Defender 14 / Fighter 6.  I built one and I really like it.  Right now
he has a naked AC of 47.  I have acheived that through the legendary levels.  The only thing I do not like is not having epic dodge.
Try as I might I can't find a build that has the same naked AC as the Gutsy Monk AC (nude/nude+defensive stance): 38/42
and also have epic dodge. 

Suggestions??

David

posts.author: HipRedux
posts.content: Mnk/dwd/ftr will never get epic dodge so pick the ED combo you like best and work from there.  Assuming your focus is on DwD, you'll need to give up WS for ED (swap out Ftr for SD).  There is no other way unless one of those custom races give ED for free.

posts.author: KidMiracleman
posts.content:
Combo suggestions??

David

posts.author: KidMiracleman
posts.content:
I might have stumbled onto something
Master of Evasion ( 30 Monk / 5 Ftr / 5 SD ) with this subrace

Shaolin
Restrictions: Race - Human
Favored Class: Monk
No Druid or Shifter levels Permitted. No Mage shifting.
Benefits: +3 Wis, Base 5 SR +1 SR/lvl (does not stack with monk SR), Magic Res 10 (will cut IGMS down a lot), 20% Concealment
Feats:
Improved Stunning Fist 5
Weapon Specialization Unarmed
Epic Weapon Specialization Unarmed
Epic Improved Ki Strike 5
Negatives: -4 Cha
ECL: 3


Thought??

posts.author: KidMiracleman
posts.content:
Actually this might be even better.  Agent of Shadow /Monk 21 /Shadowdancer 5 /Champion of Torm 14

AC 39 

Thoughts?

posts.author: HipRedux
posts.content:
Here's a halfling ED/SC3 I tossed together with good naked AC.  There may be a clone out there, though.  It's not an original concept I'm sure but just faster for me to design than search for a look-alike.  Use it to compare with your own ideas, David...

Monk(12), SD(6), Assassin(22), LE Halfling

STR8 DEX18(32) CON14 WIS14 INT14 CHA8

ED @Lvl 27
Hi-stealth, high-detection
30% Concealment
11-66 DA dmg, paralyze DC 34
SC starts @Lvl 36
UMD cast all scrolls 100% success by Lvl 31
SD 5/+2 DR 3x/day
SD Summon Shadow fiend
Asn buffs - ghostvisage, darkness, invis, impinvis (ea 1x/day, duration x 22)
Diamond SR 22

HP 356
Saves F/W/R: 22/22/38 (26/26/42 v spells)
Add'l saves: Mind Effects +2, Traps +3, Poison +6, Fear +2
BAB: 25 (5 APR kama or unarmed)
AB (max, naked): 40 (finessed melee), 38 (ranged)
AC (naked): 36, 41 w/expertise, 43 w/expertise + shadow evade 3x/day

Hide 43(58), Listen 43(51), Move Silently 43(60), Spellcraft 18(20), Tumble 40(51), UMD 34(33), for your pleasure --> 31

That looks like a good build for the Thief Acrobat subrace

David
